name: Dead Pixels (itch) (DatriKS, Cheez444, JorgeCastellonJr, xaviarsly, TheAverageTon, MrBiggles1)
name_original: Dead Pixels (itch) (DatriKS, Cheez444, JorgeCastellonJr, xaviarsly, TheAverageTon, MrBiggles1)
description:
Dead Pixels is a single-player VR game where the player must survive the coming evil.  To do this, you must find the magical reagents required to activate the stone cannon.   You have only one shot, so make it count!

The more enemies you kill, the higher the score, but you must defeat a minimum per level.
